text: Space Vol 1 & 2 is a live album by the British hard rock band Deep Purple. The show was recorded live on 11 July 1970 at the Hauptstadion in Aachen in Germany. It originated as a bootleg recording. According to rumours, the album was recorded in a van under the stage, which most certainly accounts for the overloaded vocals. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== *Ian Gillan - vocals *Ritchie Blackmore - Lead guitar *Roger Glover - bass guitar *Jon Lord - keyboards *Ian Paice - drums Category:2004 live albums Category:Deep Purple live albums
title: Space Vol 1 & 2
